qas.question: When entrusted funds are stolen, it is called what?
It is considered political when it involves what kind of money?
One form of political embezzlement is when a politician uses government resources for what use?

context: <a0_0>Embezzlement<a0_0/> is the theft of entrusted funds. It is political when it involves <a1_0>public<a1_0/> money taken by a public official for use by anyone not specified by the public. A common type of embezzlement is that of <a2_0>personal<a2_0/> use of entrusted government resources; for example, when an official assigns public employees to renovate his own house.
